title: fat_proc_align_anat_pair
description: A tool for aligning a T1w anatomical image to a T2w anatomical image using solid-body parameters (translation and rotation)

output_prefix.title: Output prefix
output_prefix.description: Output prefix for files and snapshots

output_grid.title: Output grid resolution
output_grid.description: Specify output T1w volume's final resolution (isotropic)

out_t2w_grid.title: Output T2W grid flag
out_t2w_grid.description: Final T1w volume is on the T2W volume's grid

input_t2w_mask.title: Input T2W mask
input_t2w_mask.description: Input a mask to apply to the T2w volume for alignment

do_ss_tmp_t1w.title: Apply skullstripping
do_ss_tmp_t1w.description: Apply skullstripping to the T1w volume during an intermediate step

warp.title: Warp degrees of freedom
warp.description: Specify the degrees of freedom for warping using options from 3dAllineate

no_cmd_out.title: No command output flag
no_cmd_out.description: Do not save the command line call and the location where it was run

no_clean.title: No clean flag
no_clean.description: Do not delete the temporary working directory
